long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Random Wikipedia Articles is a handy Chrome extension designed to fetch random Wikipedia articles and automatically copy them to your clipboard. With features like selecting the language of the Wikipedia article and fetching random articles

Features:

Automatically fetches random Wikipedia articles.
Ability to select the language of the Wikipedia article.
Conveniently copies articles to your clipboard for easy sharing or saving.

Easy Access to Knowledge: Random Wikipedia Articles ensures you have access to a wide variety of topics with just a click, making it easy to expand your knowledge base.
Time-Saving: Save time by effortlessly copying interesting articles to your clipboard, allowing you to share or read them later at your convenience.
Customizable Experience: Choose the language of the articles you want to read, tailoring your browsing experience to suit your preferences.

Install Random Wikipedia Articles now and embark on a journey of exploration through the vast realm of Wikipedia!
